entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
